>Tomorrow I'm leaving town for three and a half days. I'm going to Houston,

Todd

it's still extremely popular!"

messages.subject: Sandra off to Houston soon
messages.msgSnippet: Tomorrow I m leaving town for three and a half days.  I m going to Houston, or at least Dallas, I guess, depending on how Southwest feels about flying toward
messages.messageBody:
Tomorrow I'm leaving town for three and a half days. I'm going to Houston,
or at least Dallas, I guess, depending on how Southwest feels about flying
toward hurricanes.

The plan, though is Saturday, in Houston, me:

Saturday 8:30- 9:30- Learning (or Remembering) How to Learn Sandra Dodd
Keynote Saturday 12:30- How Unschooling Will Change the World

I'm the #2 keynote. The main slot is David Albert.

The website, for anyone who might be in that area and need to evacuate
anyway, come on up to the Sheraton Brookhollow.

http://www.angelfire.com/tx/wlr/conference.html





Sandra
